name: Racing game 2 players
description:
Racing game 2 players,

Is my first race game.

If you enjoyed this pls rate it and comment.

First to three laps wins!

controls:

Player 1

Arrow up Accelarate

Arrow down Break/Backwards

Arrow left/right Steer left/right

Player 2

W Accelarate

S Break/Backward

A/D Steer left/right

V1.2
